meanings.sent1: The superhero used his almighty strength to lift the heavy boulder.
meanings.sent2: The king's almighty rule was unquestioned by his subjects.
meanings.sent3: The almighty ruler of the playground was the student with the most marbles.
meanings.sent4: Her almighty determination carried her through the toughest challenges.
meanings.sent5: The almighty storm wreaked havoc on the small village.

meanings.definition: A name for God, emphasizing his power and authority
meanings.sent1: In times of trouble, people turn to the Almighty for guidance.
meanings.sent2: The Almighty is believed to have created the universe.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel declared the nut as the almighty ruler of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The sun, with its almighty warmth, provides life to all living creatures.
meanings.sent5: Legends speak of an almighty dragon guarding the treasure.
